BackstoryDef.title: Quarantine child
BackstoryDef.description: Before [PAWN_nameDef] could even speak, [PAWN_possessive] world was ravaged by worldwide pandemic. The next few years of [PAWN_possessive] life were spent in isolation with only [PAWN_possessive] parents for company. However, [PAWN_possessive] parents kept [PAWN_objective] busy, nurturing a natural talent for the arts and sciences.

BackstoryDef.title: troublesome child
BackstoryDef.description: Born into an extremely large family, [PAWN_nameDef] was starved for attention. [PAWN_pronoun] solved this problem by creating a number of contraptions that made noises, created messes, and were otherwise generally quite meddlesome.

BackstoryDef.title: Missionary
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent over a year serving on a charitable mission on behalf of [PAWN_possessive] ideoligion. The combination of charity work and proselytizing left [PAWN_nameDef] with a smattering of useful skills.

BackstoryDef.title: Daydreaming student
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s spent much of [PAWN_possessive] time in school daydreaming about exploring strange new worlds, preferably on a five-year mission. While [PAWN_possessive] performance in school was less than stellar, [PAWN_nameDef] always maintained a positive outlook on their future.

BackstoryDef.title: Daydreaming student
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was convinced they were special and had hidden, yet to be unleashed, secret powers. [PAWN_pronoun] trained with sticks as if they were legendary weapons and invented ancient-sounding spells. Although psycaster powers never manifested themselves, [PAWN_possessive] fantasies were an outlet for [PAWN_possessive] considerable imagination.

BackstoryDef.title: chosen one
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s birth was heralded as the arrival of the Chosen One, [PAWN_pronoun] who was destined to drive the steel beasts back to the black skies. [PAWN_nameDef] trained in ancient rites and battle tactics in preparation for the day [PAWN_pronoun] would called upon to fulfill their destiny.

BackstoryDef.title: medical student
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] studied at a prestigious medical academy. Despite glitterworld technology being able to heal the most grevious of wounds with the push of a button, [PAWN_possessive] university emphasized the need for the traditional, hands-on skills so many physicians had relied on over the millennia.

BackstoryDef.title: raw recruit
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to an impovershed class on a crowded but technically advanced urbworld. Many members of [PAWN_possessive] family choose military service as their best chance to improve their grim lot in life. [PAWN_nameDef] was no exception and joined as soon as [PAWN_pronoun] was of age. Once there, [PAWN_pronoun] found [PAWN_pronoun] was an excellent shot.

BackstoryDef.title: nature lover
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] had a love for learning about all natural things and had her family take [PAWN_objective] to every nature preserve on [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld. [PAWN_pronoun] adopted and cared for as many strays and [PAWN_pronoun] could, which left little time to learn the family trade of haute cuisine.

BackstoryDef.title: prepper kid
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by parents who were convinced that the apocalypse was coming any day now and were determined to survive it. [PAWN_possessive] upbringing made [PAWN_objective] quite prepared for life on the Rim, but left [PAWN_possessive] social skills quite atrophied.

BackstoryDef.title: fencing club member
BackstoryDef.description: While others were out partying, going to the gym, and forming romances, [PAWN_nameDef] was studying the blade. [PAWN_pronoun] was also doing those other things, since being an active member of [PAWN_possessive] school's martial arts club was an extremely social affair.

BackstoryDef.title: novice programmer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent a good deal of free time messing around with computer systems and taught [PAWN_objective]self to create simple programs in ancient languages, like muffaloscript, 4ktran, and C#.

BackstoryDef.title: refugee
BackstoryDef.description: All the young people in [PAWN_nameDef]'s town, including [PAWN_objective] were rounded up and send to forced labor camps for the crime of belonging to the wrong ideoligion. [PAWN_nameDef] barely managed to survive the grueling conditions; when asked how, [PAWN_pronoun] would only reply "by my wits."

BackstoryDef.title: apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] began their craft at an early age, and apprenticed under a skilled artisan.

BackstoryDef.title: art apprentice
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] began their craft at an early age, and apprenticed under a skilled artist.

BackstoryDef.title: apprentice blacksmith
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents recognized [PAWN_pronoun] had an affinity for metalwork and sent [PAWN_objective] to work under a blacksmith at an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: apprentice carpenter
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents recognized [PAWN_pronoun] had an affinity for woodworking and sent [PAWN_objective] to work under a carpenter at an early age.

BackstoryDef.title: plague survivor
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef]'s home was ravaged by a planet-wide plague. [PAWN_pronoun] survived, but [PAWN_possessive] immune system never truly recovered.
